desc_main: Located in the heart of the natural beauty of the south, Hotel del Sur is a haven of tranquility and comfort. Surrounded by majestic landscapes and with easy access to the main tourist attractions, our hotel offers an authentic experience for those looking to unwind and relax. Enjoy our cozy rooms, designed to guarantee maximum comfort, and our facilities that include a swimming pool, a restaurant with local and international cuisine, and quaternary areas perfect for resting. Hotel del Sur invites you to live unforgettable moments, with a personalized service that will make your stay a unique experience.
